data.title: Sharon Brown (Lansing) Obituary 2018
data.meta_description: Sharon Denise (Trainor) Brown departed this life on January 31, 2018 at McLaren Hospital in Lansing, Michigan. Age 52 years old. She was born on January 11, 1966 in Lansing, Mic...
data.text:
Sharon Denise (Trainor) Brown departed this life on January 31, 2018 at McLaren Hospital in Lansing, Michigan. Age 52 years old. She was born on January 11, 1966 in Lansing, Michigan. She was next to the youngest of seven children of Fletcher Trainor and the late Will Ella Trainor.

Sharon graduated from Lansing Sexton High School. She loved spending time with her family, especially her boys.

She accepted the Lord Jesus Christ as her personal Savior at an early age. She became a member of New Mount Calvary Baptist Church and later Friendship Baptist Church. Sharon is currently a member of Reachout Christian Center. She loved to sing and was an active member of the Reachout choir until her illness prevented her from attending.

Sharon leaves to cherish her loving memory, sons: Henry and Timothy Brown; stepson, Malcolm (Max) Brown; father, Fletcher Trainor; two sisters, Velma Trainor, Lansing, Michigan and Donella Elaine Trainor, Fort Myers, Florida; three brothers, Jerry Trainor, Lansing, Michigan, Rickie Trainor, Mesa, Arizona, and Kelvin Trainor, Warren, Michigan; many aunts, uncles, nieces, nephews, cousins, other relatives and friends.

She was preceded in death by her mother, Will Ella Trainor and sister, Diana Jean (Trainor) Horton.

Sharon will be deeply missed by her family and friends.
